Sentencas: A 2D computational fluid dynamics (CFD) model was developed to study the performance of a planar solid oxide electrolyzer cell (SOEC) for hydrogen production.
Titulo: Computational fluid dynamics modeling of a solid oxide electrolyzer cell for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The governing equations for mass continuity, momentum conservation, energy conservation and species conservation were discretized with the finite volume method (FVM).
Titulo: Computational fluid dynamics modeling of a solid oxide electrolyzer cell for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The coupling of velocity and pressure was treated with the SIMPLEC (Semi-Implicit Method for Pressure Linked Equations - Consistent) algorithm.
Titulo: Computational fluid dynamics modeling of a solid oxide electrolyzer cell for hydrogen production

Sentencas: Simulations were performed to investigate the effects of operating/structural parameters on heat/mass transfer and the electric characteristics of a planar SOEC.
Titulo: Computational fluid dynamics modeling of a solid oxide electrolyzer cell for hydrogen production

Sentencas: It is found that the gas velocity at the cathode increases significantly along the main flow channel, as the increase in H-2 molar fraction decreases the density and viscosity of the gas mixture at the cathode.
Titulo: Computational fluid dynamics modeling of a solid oxide electrolyzer cell for hydrogen production

Sentencas: It is also found that increasing the inlet gas velocity can enhance the SOEC performance.
Titulo: Computational fluid dynamics modeling of a solid oxide electrolyzer cell for hydrogen production

Sentencas: Another important finding is that the electrode porosity has small effect on SOEC performance.
Titulo: Computational fluid dynamics modeling of a solid oxide electrolyzer cell for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The results of this paper provide better understanding on the coupled heat/mass transfer and electrochemical reaction phenomena in an SOEC.
Titulo: Computational fluid dynamics modeling of a solid oxide electrolyzer cell for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The model developed can serve as a useful tool for SOEC design optimization.
Titulo: Computational fluid dynamics modeling of a solid oxide electrolyzer cell for hydrogen production
